scripts.test: echo '=> Verifying...' && npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test-unit-coverage && npm run test-integration-coverage
scripts.prepublishOnly: echo '=> This is a terminal project and should not be published to npm! Exiting...' && exit 0
scripts.clean: echo '=> Cleaning built assets...' && rm -rf .nyc_output coverage
scripts.serve-dev: echo '=> Running app in Development mode...' && docker-compose -f src/docker/dev/docker-compose.yml up --build
scripts.serve: echo '=> Running app in Production/CI mode...' && npm run build-docker-prod && export WsImageTag=$(node -e 'console.log(`${process.env.npm_package_name}:${process.env.npm_package_version}`.slice(1));') && docker-compose -f src/docker/prod/docker-compose.yml up
scripts.serve-ci-detached: echo '=> Running app in CI mode (detached)...' && npm run build-docker-prod && export WsImageTag=$(node -e 'console.log(`${process.env.npm_package_name}:${process.env.npm_package_version}`.slice(1));') && docker-compose -f src/docker/ci/docker-compose.yml up -d && wget --retry-connrefused --tries=7 --spider 127.0.0.1:{{portNumber}}/health-check && echo '=> App now running in CI mode!'
scripts.stop-detached: echo '=> Stopping Production app...' && export WsImageTag=$(node -e 'console.log(`${process.env.npm_package_name}:${process.env.npm_package_version}`.slice(1));') && docker-compose -f src/docker/ci/docker-compose.yml down --rmi local
scripts.build-artifacts: echo '=> Building all artifacts...' && npm run build-docker-prod
scripts.test-integration: echo '=> Running Integration Tests...' && npm run serve-ci-detached && npm run test-integration-dev && npm run stop-detached
scripts.test-integration-coverage: echo '=> Running Integration Tests w/ Coverage...' && npm run test-integration && sed -i '' 's/"path":"\/usr\/src\/app/"path":"./g'  .nyc_output/*.json && nyc --reporter=html report && nyc --lines 80 --functions 80 --branches 80 --per-file check-coverage
scripts.test-unit: echo '=> Running Tests...' && mocha -u tdd --timeout 60000 --colors test/unit/**/*.spec.js
scripts.watch-test-unit: echo '=> Running Test Watcher...' && mocha --watch test/unit/**/*.spec.js
scripts.test-unit-coverage: echo '=> Running Tests w/ Coverage...' && npx nyc npm run test-unit && nyc --reporter=html report && npx nyc --lines 80 --functions 80 --branches 80 --per-file check-coverage
